column4: how can I insert a program in gnome when gnome start, it runs ? (something like startup in windows)
click computer, there is a menu called sessions somewhere, u can choose startup programs there
who needs a tabbed terminal when u have screen tbh.
it's run, search, recent, ... no computer !
ok, u ok editing it manually?
it's ok :D thx for ur help . going to test ;)
